mapper.select: select g1.search_key,(select search_value from search_engine where search_key = g1.search_key group by search_value order by count(search_value) desc limit 1) as search_value,(select count(search_value) from search_engine where search_key = g1.search_key group by search_value order by count(search_value) desc limit 1) as cnt from search_engine g1 group by search_key;
select *, count(*) as cnt from search_engine group by search_value order by cnt desc limit 10;
